properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:48PM CST until February 13 at 4:45AM CST by NWS Huntsville AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Southwestern Madison County in north central Alabama...

* Until 445 AM CST Thursday.

* At 1044 PM CST, reporting gauges indicate Indian Creek at Madison
will shortly go above flood stage. This will cause flooding along
the Indian Creek Greenway and Creekwood Park Playground. Up to one
inch of rain has already fallen. An additional half to one inch of
rainfall will likely cause further rises.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Northwestern Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Triana,
Marshall Space Flight Center and Harvest.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
